snippet.title: reky - Official Release Date Announcement Trailr
snippet.description:
Fresh technical drawing aesthetics meet elegantly designed logic challenges in this minimalist puzzle title with just a dash of color.

No ticking clock, no ads, no paywalls.
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1182470
AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/app/reky/id1098156659
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beyondthosehills.pid.gp.reky

A logic puzzle game, Reky marries an elegance of design with an architectural minimalist aesthetic to create an experience that is fresh, stylish and satisfyingly challenging. Using the one-finger touch controls, the player interacts with the different puzzle elements of each level, shifting and moving them in order to create a path to the goal. Everything in the game is simple and functional, with only cubes, lines, exits, portals and a dash of color used to create a large variety of brain-teasing challenges.

● Elegant logic puzzles, escalating to extreme challenge levels
● Aesthetics inspired by architectural minimalism
● Touch-optimized and designed to be played with one finger
● Crystal clear visuals, optimized for iOS displays
● Portrait and landscape
● 96 levels and 22 achievements

-------------------------

http://rekygame.com
http://beyondthosehills.com

AppStore release date: October 10, 2019
